n, k = map(int, input().split())
h = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]
print(sum(1 if i >= k else 0 for i in h))

import sys

N, K = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
h = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] >= K:
        count += 1

print(count)


n, k = map(int, input().split())
h = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]  # リスト内包表記で受け取る
print(sum(1 if i >= k else 0 for i in h))  # リスト内包表記で解答を出力する

import sys

n, k = map(int, input().split())
h = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]
print(sum(1 for i in h if i >= k))
n, k = map(int, input().split())
h = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]
print(sum([1 if i >= k else 0 for i in h]))

#!/usr/bin/env python

import sys

N, K = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))
h = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] >= K:
        count += 1

print(count)

import sys

N, K = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))
h = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readlines()))

count = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] >= K:
        count += 1
print(count)
